text:
週末は
ずっと一緒に
いられるね!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.03%;top: 0.39%;width: 16.49%;height: 15.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
彼はいつも
恋に夢中だな…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 29.52%;top: 24.21%;width: 15.32%;height: 8.57%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
おいジュウ!!
今すぐ
席に戻れ!!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79.31%;top: 2.59%;width: 14.15%;height: 11.48%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
エイフェン
シートベルトしないと
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.71%;top: 34.51%;width: 24.04%;height: 5.90%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
ごめん! ママに手を
振ってたから
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.10%;top: 65.88%;width: 18.09%;height: 7.15%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
あきれるよ
エイフェン…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.73%;top: 72.48%;width: 11.60%;height: 4.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
皆
準備はいいな
出発するぞ
